programme.title: Meerkat Manor: Rise of the Dynasty
programme.desc: Alone and at risk, evicted Sencha is clinging close to her family in the hope of a reprieve until an unexpected lifeline presents itself in the shape of rover Lilac; who brings with him the prospect of a better life.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Explore the world of the carnivores, from cats and dogs to bears and dolphins that must make a kill in order to survive. To win, they must overcome the weapons, intelligence and speed of their prey.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A journey into the uncharted corners of the ocean where the newest discoveries are being made and where the strangest sea creatures can be found.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Using the latest techniques and remote-controlled 'ant-cams', enter the world of armoured-plated insects, spiders and scorpions.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Enter the world of plants as time-lapse technology makes this violent and self-seeking organism's behaviour a truly dynamic and surprisingly emotional experience.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: By studying the world of primates in new and intimate detail, this episode offers fresh insight into the development of intelligence and social behaviour.

programme.title: Meerkat Manor: Rise of the Dynasty
programme.desc: Alone and at risk, evicted Sencha is clinging close to her family in the hope of a reprieve until an unexpected lifeline presents itself in the shape of rover Lilac; who brings with him the prospect of a better life.

programme.title: Wild Alaska
programme.desc: As spring lights up the land, Alaska faces the greatest transformation on earth. Temperatures soar, and as the sun hits the snow and ice, water, light and warmth return.

programme.title: Wild Alaska
programme.desc: The few short weeks of an Alaskan summer must sustain the abundant wildlife for the whole year. No season brings more surprises. There is a predictable wealth of riches, but there is so little time to master the art of survival.

programme.title: Wild Alaska
programme.desc: The vast mountains, the surrounding oceans and the northerly latitude combine to deliver one of the most extreme winters on the planet.

programme.title: Hidden Habitats
programme.desc: Steven Backshall investigates what make the Amazon so diverse. He looks at the nutrient poor nature of the rainforest and discusses the strategies used by the life in the jungle to make the most of the little nutrients available.

programme.title: Hidden Habitats
programme.desc: In 1985, wolves were released back into Yellowstone National Park. The re-introduction of the predator has set off a cascade of events through the food chain.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Examine clues from Madagascar's animals, plants and landscape to discover how the island's past has produced its present; the Tsingy have cut off animals in isolated gorges allowing them to evolve unique species.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: The narrow eastern strip of the island is rich in life; travel from the highest mountains, where trees are few, to lush rainforests, to the tropical coast, home to ring-tailed lemurs, jewelled geckos and predatory wasps.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Some of the strategies for survival in Madagascar's dry south are ingenious.

programme.title: The Matrix
programme.desc: A computer hacker called Neo learns that his entire reality is merely a computer-created illusion. In reality, humans are living batteries used by the machine armies that have taken over the world. Neo is the only person who can save humanity.

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: Neo and the rebel leaders have 72 hours to stop an army of machines that were sent to destroy the last human outpost.

programme.title: The Matrix Revolutions
programme.desc: The war is fought on multiple fronts when the human city of Zion is invaded by thousands of Sentinels. Morpheus remains in Zion to aid in the fight, while Neo and Trinity make a deal with the Machines to deal with the renegade program known as Smith.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles

programme.desc: A fight over the family Christmas card escalates into a major feud between Kourtney, Kim, and Khloé. Meanwhile, Scott feels guilty for moving on to a new relationship.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kris worries that pregnant Khloé is taking her healthy lifestyle too far and putting her baby at risk. Meanwhile Scott's business trip to Miami takes a wild turn, jeopardizing an exciting new business venture.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kourtney ponders taking a holiday during the holidays to get away from non-stop fighting with her sisters. Khloé tries to avoid the public eye until it's time for her pregnancy announcement. Kris is worried that she's being poisoned.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kourtney is devastated when Scott introduces the kids to his girlfriend without her permission. Meanwhile the family is determined to redeem themselves on Celebrity Family Feud at all costs, and Kim encounters an issue with her selfie taking.

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire does some spring cleaning while Phil struggles with not being a spring chicken when Luke starts outperforming him. Haley takes Alex to a music festival to take her mind off college. Gloria and Jay challenge one another to give up soaps and cigars.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay's birthday brings everyone together and Phil is beside himself over the super cool gift he got Jay, a high-tech outdoor grill. Claire and Mitch decide they will 'offer' to pay back the money Jay loaned them ages ago.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay agrees to sub in on Cam's bowling team for the finals. Unfortunately Cam was not fully upfront about it being an all gay league, which puts Jay in a precarious position.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Jay run an errand together to pick up Lily's hand-me-down princess castle for Joe. However, both are in a mood because Phil is upset that Claire won't let him buy a video game console and Jay thinks Gloria is letting Joe play with girlie items.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Alex's worst nightmare is realized when she gets news that she has to share the Valedictorian title with her number one competitor, Sunjay.

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The whole family is at Jay and Gloria's for Alex's graduation party, except for Phil. He ingeniously figures out a way to be there via Skype and a robotic vessel after being unexpectedly detained in Seattle on a business trip.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Haley's attempt to stop Andy from proposing to Beth ends up with both Haley and Andy needing to cope with their emotions and both have their own special ways of doing so. Phil and Claire seem to only make matters worse.

programme.title: Barcelona de Guayaquil x Santos
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada, o Barcelona recebe o Santos no Estádio Monumental. A equipe equatoriana já está classificada. O Peixe precisa da vitória e ainda torce contra o Boca Juniors para chegar às oitavas de final.

programme.title: América de Cali x Deportivo La Guaira
programme.desc: Pela 5ª rodada do grupo H, o América de Cali recebe o Deportivo La Guaira no Estádio Alfonso López. Em confronto que deve definir apenas o lanterrna e o classificado à Copa Sul-Americana, ambas as equipes ainda buscam a primeira vitória no torneio.

programme.title: Santa Fe x Junior Barranquilla
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada do grupo D, o Independiente Santa Fe recebe o Junior no Estádio Bellavista. Los Cadenales não têm mais chances nem de Sul-Americana, mas tentam atrapalhar a vida do rival. Os Tiburones necessitam vencer e ainda torcer contra o Flu.

programme.title: River Plate x Fluminense
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada do grupo D, o River Plate recebe o Fluminense no Monumental de Núñez. Após a histórica vitória na última rodada, o River pode terminar em primeiro do grupo. O Flu precisa vencer para não depender do resultado do outro jogo da chave.

programme.title: Argentina x Brasil
programme.desc: Na final, Brasil e Argentina fazem um dos maiores clássicos mundiais no Estádio do Maracanã. A Seleção Canarinho busca seu décimo título na competição. Já a Albiceleste tenta igualar o Uruguai e conquistar seu 15º caneco continental.

programme.title: Palmeiras x Universitario
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada do grupo A, o Palmeiras recebe o Universitario no Allianz Parque. O Verdão busca fechar a primeira fase com a melhor campanha geral, o que lhe garantiria sempre decidir em casa no mata-mata. Los Cremas brigam por vaga na Sul-Americana.

programme.title: Ecos da América
programme.desc: Jornalistas do time ESPN falam sobre a carreira e a cobertura de grandes eventos, além de histórias curiosas e marcantes de sua trajetória profissional.

programme.title: Atlético-MG x Deportivo La Guaira
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada do grupo H, o Atlético-MG recebe o Deportivo La Guaira no Estádio do Mineirão. O Galo busca manter a invencibilidade e garantir a primeira colocação geral do torneio. Já os de la Costa têm chances de garantir vaga na Sul-Americana.

programme.title: Flamengo x Vélez Sarsfield
programme.desc: Pela 6ª rodada do grupo G, o Flamengo recebe o Vélez Sarsfield no Maracanã. Em jogo valendo a liderança do grupo, o Rubro-Negro tenta manter a invencibilidade e a primeira posição. O Vélez, também classificado, tem três vitórias seguidas no torneio.

programme.title: Flamengo x Unión La Calera

programme.title: The Missing

programme.title: The Missing

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: A mother is inside a gas station when a man steals her car, with her 13-year-old and 6-month old daughters inside. Then, when a waitress is sexually assaulted, she takes matters into her own hands, attacking her assaulter.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: When a man with a shotgun bursts into his home late one night, a young man is forced to defend himself and protect his fiancee. And then, a man goes on a violent rampage in a diner, and two women find themselves in a fight for survival.

programme.desc: Infamous sex abuse sports doctor attacked by angry parent; a gang member, a snitch and the F.B.I. collide; defiant defendant curses out judge; murderer taunts mother of two teenage sons; singing for a lenient sentence; prisoner meets his baby in court.

programme.title: Chaos in Court

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: Claude Garrett says he tried to rescue his girlfriend, Lorie Lee Lance, from a fire that broke out in their home. But a jury decided he was the one who set the fire with one goal in mind: murder. Chris and Fatima will dig deep to find out what happened.

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: While visiting Russia, John McClane discovers his son, Jack, is a CIA operative. Together, John and Jack battle against a nuclear weapons heist in Russia.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: His whole life, Danny has been used to fight in illegal gladiator fights. Controlled only by a collar he wears around his neck, he has never known any human emotion; a car crash leaves his 'owner' in a coma, and Danny is left on his own in the world.

programme.title: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind
programme.desc: Based on the true story about Chuck Barris, a popular game show host in the 60s and 70s who also claims to have been a CIA hit man.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: In a world where emotions are suppressed, a law enforcement agent overthrows the system.

programme.title: The Betrayed
programme.desc: A young woman undergoes a psychological journey directed by a mysterious stranger who believes her husband is guilty of stealing from a crime syndicate.

programme.title: Victoria and Abdul
programme.desc: When she is brought a new servant from India, Queen Victoria convinces him to become her teacher in all things relating to his homeland. Soon their bond grows into something more: a deep friendship between a lonely old queen and a young man far from home.

programme.title: My Blue Heaven
programme.desc: A FBI agents tries to keep a street-smart mobster, who has a problem keeping a low-profile, alive when he moves to the suburbs as part of a witness relocation program.

programme.title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton!
programme.desc: A checkout girl is caught in a love triangle when she wins a date with a bad-boy star.

programme.title: The Chosen
programme.desc: Two young Jewish boys in 1940's Brooklyn find a common bond through stickball.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin was born as an elderly man. As he grows up he gets younger which is hard on the people around him. He meets a woman while he is in his forties but he gets younger as she ages.

programme.title: Punch Drunk Love
programme.desc: A beleaguered small-business owner embarks on a romantic journey with a mysterious woman.

programme.title: In Secret
programme.desc: In 19th-century Paris, a young woman has been forced into a loveless marriage to her cousin by her oppressive aunt. She meets and begins an illicit affair with her husband's handsome childhood friend.

programme.title: Two for the Money
programme.desc: After a career-ending injury, a football star gets too close to a renowned sports gambler.

programme.title: Desperately Seeking Susan
programme.desc: A bored housewife loses her memory and mistakenly believes herself to be a woman from the personal ads whom she was seeking. Her new persona has her dodging several shady characters through the streets of New York City.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: Julie finds herself in a strange new series of events that could change the undead after she is saved by a zombie.

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: An awkward Catholic schoolgirl dreams of being a star in order to kiss her dream boy.

programme.title: Miss Julie
programme.desc: In 1890, the daughter of an aristocrat encourages her father's valet to seduce her.

programme.title: Dead Man Walking
programme.desc: A nun becomes a death row inmate's spiritual advisor as he awaits his execution.

programme.title: A Better Life
programme.desc: A gardener struggles to keep his son away from gangs and immigration agents all while trying to give the boy opportunities he never had.

programme.title: Sophie's Choice
programme.desc: Haunted by her past, a survivor of a Nazi concentration camp struggles to find happiness.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: While assisting a scientific facility on Mars, a team of space marines is forced to go to war with demons that have been unleashed on the planet.

programme.title: View From the Top
programme.desc: A small-town woman attempts to achieve her goal of becoming a flight attendant.

programme.title: Rock of Ages
programme.desc: While following their dreams of stardom in Hollywood, a couple meets on the Sunset Strip.

programme.title: In Good Company
programme.desc: Follows the working relationship that develops between a middle age advertising executive and the young inexperienced business protégé that he finds himself working for after a corporate takeover.

programme.title: Boys and Girls
programme.desc: A friendship is put to the ultimate test when two best friends wind up in bed together.

programme.title: He Said, She Said
programme.desc: Two reporters fall in love despite the fact that they never seem to agree about anything.

programme.title: Blades of Glory
programme.desc: When two male figure skaters are stripped of their medals, they decide to skate together.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: The gang returns to Michigan for their 10 year high school reunion.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: A woman's wealthy, abusive ex commits apparent suicide, leaving his fortune to her. However, after lethal events begin to occur around her she begins to believe she is being targeted by an unseen stalker.

programme.title: The Conspirator
programme.desc: A novice lawyer reluctantly agrees to defend the only woman charged in association with the death of Abraham Lincoln.

programme.title: The 15:17 to Paris
programme.desc: Three American soldiers and long-time friends are riding a quiet passenger train ride through France, but when an armed man threatens to cause a massacre they leap into action despite being unarmed themselves, averting a potential mass tragedy.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: A woman who works as an elf at a year-round Christmas store meets a man and finds her life changing.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: The Brady family is back and facing serious financial trouble. With $20,000 in back taxes owned, the family risks losing their beloved home to their neighbour. The kids plot to secretly raise the money so they don't have to move to somewhere else.

programme.title: Ready or Not
programme.desc: A new bride's sinister in-laws force her to take part in a dangerous game.

programme.title: The Girl With All the Gifts
programme.desc: In the future, humanity is ravaged by a fungal disease that turns humans to zombies. After their base is attacked, a teacher escapes with an infected child being studied. Along with a scientist, they must traverse the dangerous country to safety.

programme.title: Body Brokers
programme.desc: After travelling to Los Angeles to get treatment for his drug addiction, a man discovers there is more to his rehab facility than meets the eye. Soon enough, he's on the road to uncovering a billion-dollar cover up tied to the recovery industry.

programme.title: The Good Liar
programme.desc: A conman targets a wealthy widow, but his scam turns into a game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: You Can Count on Me
programme.desc: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil when her struggling brother returns to town.

programme.title: Above the Rim
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball player is torn between his coach and a local gangster.

programme.title: Beasts of the Southern Wild
programme.desc: A six-year-old girl leaves her hometown to search for her mother after her father's health crisis releases fictional creatures into the wild.

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: A surfer girl falls for a football player while preparing for an important competition.

programme.title: Lola Versus
programme.desc: A 29-year-old woman dumped by her fiancé just three weeks before their wedding embarks on a series of adventures to help her come to terms with approaching 30 as a single woman.

programme.title: Killer Klowns From Outer Space
programme.desc: Aliens who look like circus clowns terrorize a small town, abducting and killing the townspeople.

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: When the son of a wealthy family is kidnapped, their driver, an ex-special forces operative, must use all of his skills to bring the boy back safely.

programme.title: Golden Arm
programme.desc: A hardened trucker trains her sensitive best friend to compete in the National Ladies Arm Wrestling Championship.

programme.title: A Family Thing
programme.desc: When a white man learns that his birth mother was black, he travels to Chicago to meet his new family.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: The unluckiest man in Vegas sees his luck change when he falls in love.

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A maverick field colonel attempts to stop a terrorist who has hijacked a nuclear warhead.

programme.desc: A detective in 1970s America works to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas. The kingpin from Manhattan is smuggling the drug into the country from the Far East.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: A retired black-ops agent brings his old team back together in an attempt to uncover the assailants that attacked him in his home.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: After it is discovered that a mother has lost three sons in the war, a group of reluctant soldiers are ordered to find and rescue her one remaining son from the frontlines and send him home.

programme.title: The Chi
programme.desc: Emmett and Tiff explore new things as a couple. Trig tries to counsel Jamal when he reaches his breaking point. Imani takes care of the trap house for good. Kevin journeys to the West Side with a new friend.

programme.title: Flatbush Misdemeanors
programme.desc: When the school goes on lockdown due to a bomb threat from an expelled student, Dan moves to help Jess defuse the situation while Zayna learns a shocking secret about her family through Demi.

programme.title: Black Monday
programme.desc: Mo and Dawn work through some 'artistic differences' as Nomi's star rises. Blair and Tiff schmooze a VIP, and Keith tries to rekindle things with Mike.

programme.title: First Wives Club
programme.desc: Hazel and Bree go to Sag Harbor to support Ari, both in present day and in flashbacks, as they reminisce about Ari's wedding to David, and how unhappy she was even back then. As Ari considers divorce, David surprises her by asking for a vow renewal.

programme.title: Twenties
programme.desc: In Improv class, Nia grapples with being given stereotypical Black roles. Incensed by Ben getting the promotion over her, Marie searches for answers, while Hattie tries to make her voice heard in the writers room.

programme.title: The One and Only Dick Gregory
programme.desc: Stunning archival footage and contemporary interviews help take a closer look at comedian Dick Gregory's legacy. Documenting his personal reinventions, while also hearing from entertainers who have been inspired by his blueprint.

programme.title: Richard Pryor Live on the Sunset Strip
programme.desc: Covering topics ranging from sex to slavery to Pryor's own scandalous episode with drugs.

programme.desc: Desus and Mero welcome Vince Staples.

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The story of Billy Beane's attempt to put together a baseball team using computer generated analysis.

programme.title: 20th Century Women
programme.desc: When a mother notices her son distancing himself from her, she enlists two other women to help him. As her son struggles through growing up, each of the women tries to guide him. Her relationship with her son changes beyond what she imagined.

programme.title: Blue Jasmine
programme.desc: A down-and-out New York City socialite winds up on the doorstep of her estranged sister in San Francisco.

programme.title: Hot Summer Nights
programme.desc: A teen sent to stay with his aunt in Cape Cod for the summer struggles to fit in, but after a chance encounter with a small-time drug dealer he begins selling drugs to other teens, using his brains to help grow his new partner's illicit operation.

programme.title: Java Heat
programme.desc: An American Marine teams up with a Muslim police officer in Indonesia to find a jewel thief.

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: When their relationship sours, a couple undergoes a procedure to erase their memories of each other.

programme.title: Made in Italy
programme.desc: An artist travels from London to Italy to sell the house he inherited from his late wife, while also mending his relationship with his estranged son.

programme.title: Reality Bites
programme.desc: Four friends face the promise and pitfalls of life in the 1990s when they share a house.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: Young Shakespeare meets a beautiful woman who inspires his work and captures his heart.

programme.title: A Walk on the Moon
programme.desc: A bored housewife experiences a sexual reawakening with a traveling blouse salesman.

programme.title: Winter's Bone
programme.desc: A teenager learns that her missing father used their home as collateral for his bail. Knowing her father is involved in drug trafficking, she searches for him in order to keep her family together.

programme.desc: A young Pakistani man gets caught in a conflict between his American Dream, a hostage crisis and the call of his family's homeland.

programme.desc: A wealthy Wall Street financier struggles with his homicidal tendencies.
